pr_title: [RW-5341][risk=low] Optionally include demographics in metrics export

timeline.message: Optionally include demographics in metrics export

timeline.bodyText: nit: the rest of the multi value columns are separated with a newline as well
timeline.author: ericsong

timeline.bodyText: nit: i think you can just move this object into the conditional and drop the null check
timeline.author: ericsong

replies.bodyText: includeDemographics is driven by a flag - not null'ness of the demographics value. So this doesn't work - unless I'm misunderstanding the suggestion.
replies.author: calbach
